00026         const Key &InputConfiguration::getKey(const string &action)
00027         {
00028             map<string, Key>::iterator result = keys.find(action);
00029             if(result != keys.end())
00030                 return result->second;
00031                         else {
00032                 LogManager::getInstance()->error(
00033                         "No key defined for action '%s'", action.c_str());
00034                                 static const Key dummyKey = KEY_UNKNOWN;
00035                                 return dummyKey;
00036                         }
00037         }
00038 
00039         void InputConfiguration::setKey(const string &action, const Key &key)
00040         {
00041             keys[action] = key;
00042         }
00043     }
